autotransform.util.datastore module

Provides a globally accessible store of data associated with items from the Input. Used as a singleton. Attempting to construct a DataStore object outside of the get() method will lead to unexpected behavior.

class autotransform.util.datastore.DataStore

Bases: object

The data store containing a mapping of item to data object.

__instance

The singleton instance of the DataStore.

Type

Optional[DataStore]

items

The mapping from item to data.

Type

Dict[str, Optional[DataObject]]

add_object(key: str, data: Optional[autotransform.util.dataobject.DataObject]) → None

Adds an object to the data store associating it with an item.

Parameters

  • key (str) – The item returned by an Input.

  • data (Optional[DataObject]) – The data to associate with the item.

Raises

KeyError – Raises an error when the item is already present in the store.

static get() → autotransform.util.datastore.DataStore

A singleton getter method for the DataStore.

Returns

The singleton instance of the DataStore.

Return type

DataStore

get_object_data(key: str) → Optional[autotransform.util.dataobject.DataObject]

Gets the data associated with an item if present.

Parameters

key (str) – The item from the Input.

Returns

The data associated with the provided item

Return type

Optional[DataObject]

items: Dict[str, Optional[autotransform.util.dataobject.DataObject]]
